Package index

All functions

check_occs()
Checks and flags GBIF occurrence data based on common coordinate issues
clean_keys()
Clean a keys output to ensure only accepted species from GBIF and WCVP are being analysed
clean_occs()
Clean GBIF occurrences based on user-selected flags and/or specific gbifIDs
get_gbif_occs()
Download georeferenced occurrence data using GBIF name identifier
get_name_keys()
Get accepted GBIF and POWO identifiers (keys) for taxon names to support data downloads
get_native_range()
Get native ranges for taxa
get_occs_range()
Get ISO two-digit code from occurrence lat longs
make_lc_points()
Combined function to get clean SIS points file using name identifiers
make_metrics()
Generate metrics from a clean point occurrence file
make_sis_csvs()
Generate all SIS connect csv files
make_sis_occs()
Convert cleaned gbif DWCA structure to IUCN SIS format
make_zip()
Generate the SIS connect zip file
map_species_batch()
Display a leaflet map to show the distribution of occurrence data for each species Batch version that iterates through species
map_species_single()
Display a leaflet map to show the distribution of occurrence data for each species
search_name_gbif()
Query taxon name against GBIF backbone
search_name_powo()
Query taxon name against POWO (Plants of the World Online) backbone
sis_allfields()
Generate the allfields.csv file
sis_assessments()
Generate the assessments.csv file
sis_countries()
Generate the countries.csv file
sis_credits()
Generate the credits.csv file
sis_habitats()
Generate the habitats.csv file
sis_plantspecific()
Generate the plantspecific.csv file
sis_references()
Generate the references.csv file
sis_taxonomy()
Generate the taxonomy.csv file
